# Nairoreel Productions

> 3D Animation, VFX & Visual Production Studio in Nairobi, Kenya

## About
Nairoreel Productions is a 3D animation, VFX, and visual production studio based in Nairobi, Kenya. We specialise in cinematic product animations, visual effects, motion graphics, film production, and photography for brands across East Africa and beyond.

## Location
Nairobi, Kenya — serving clients in Kenya, East Africa, and internationally.

## Team
- Brandon Rono — 3D Animation & VFX Director
- Bill Hwaga — Photography & Videography Director
- Maria Yusufali — Communications Director

## Services
- 3D Animation — Product visualization, 3D commercials, animated brand content
- Visual Effects (VFX) — Motion graphics, compositing, visual effects for film and advertising
- Film Production — Cinematography, directing, post-production for brand films and commercials
- Photography — Product, fashion, and event photography in Nairobi, Kenya

## Featured Projects
- KFC: 3D animated product visualization of the KFC drive-thru experience (2024)
- Reload KE: 3D product animation for Reload isotonic drink (April 2025)
- EKUC Pathfinder Camporee: 3D animated promotional video for a youth event (March 2025)
- Raila Odinga Tribute: 3D motion graphics tribute to Former Prime Minister Raila Amollo Odinga (October 2025)
- Car Passion Project: 3D animated short film with cinematic car visuals (Coming Soon)
- Nairobi Fashion Week: Photography series capturing East African fashion and designers (2024)

## Process
1. Discovery — Brand research, stakeholder interviews, competitive analysis
2. Concept — Creative ideation, storyboards, creative briefs
3. Production — Shooting, 3D asset creation, VFX, motion graphics
4. Refinement — Color grading, sound design, revision rounds
